Reviews.Title: “Good base location for Paris”
Reviews.Author: Sheridan_Iluka
Reviews.Content: first class hotel regular visitor various european hotels rates right rooms spacious clean staff friendly although primarily business hotel stayed young child couldnt asked service shower broke one occasion repaired within 15 minutes pleasant location plenty area shopping etc even small rear would definetly stay

Reviews.Title: “Convenient to many amenities...”
Reviews.Author: cwil2go
Reviews.Content: spent 5 enjoyable days kleber brilliant location could walk significant land marks etc bonus travelling necessary public transport metro bus airport bus right doorstep staff friendly informative breakfast adequate fresh tasty loved nature hotel bit disappointed lack satellite service especially evenings sightseeing day little energy left overall thoroughly enjoyed stay kleber hotel hope go back time soon

Reviews.Title: “Just a jump to the left......traditional hotel and a thumbs up!”

Reviews.Content: nice friendly staff rooms clean sound level hotel low manager help full kind asking question time gave us best answer example asking direction go back paris use hotel recomend hotel

Reviews.Title: “Comfortable - 3 stars”

Reviews.Content: spent one night hotel kleber friend advised hotel located central paris walking distance arc de triomphe eiffel tower hotel well decorated inside age building room ok spacious clean however unpleasant smell lift additionally stupid way closing room doors key hole located close door tiny hand without pain bed comfortable room opposite street quiet night

Reviews.Title: “This hotel is a joke!!!!! Broken lift, poor security, falling apart, no heat..”

Reviews.Content: hotel conveniently located 5 minute walk arc de triomphe numerous cafes restaurants nearby hotel reception nicely decorated staff reception friendly helpful bedroom bathroom tiny like paris still charming surrounding streets quiet evening kleber metro stop near arc de triomphe close well another metro stop wasnt difficult go across town

Reviews.Title: “Fantastic stay at Le Kleber”
Reviews.Author: KatieM1983
Reviews.Content: hotels factor fantastic location 10 minute walk away eiffel tower cute inside decor unusual definitely gives hotel authentic french character rooms small good standard rooms choose one street side view much nicer street quiet traffic noise staff friendly downside breakfast fruit salad breakfast one day decided search nearby bakeries fresh croissant much better price good got individual much less rate website 120 euros per night rate thought great given proximity centre

Reviews.Title: “Not too bad”

Reviews.Content: got fabulous deal night felt room value money particularly using stop rooms overly large certainly comfortable two people bathroom functional one criticism central staircase like atrium level would travel way hotel location wise hotel definitely great spot right arch de triomphe eiffel tower nearby bistros tad touristy nature enjoyed meals nonetheless metro extremely easy use summer holidays crowds relaxing time year go paris hotel kleber definitely 3 star rating sure worth 4 stars claim though

Reviews.Title: “Quaint & romantic boutique hotel”

Reviews.Content: returned trip stayed hotel kleber 1 night paris marathon booking hotel looked reviews usual guided price specifically proximity arc de triomphe marathon start line coming morning seeing negative reviews surprised always take negative completely reviews people tend get experiences rather number negative reviews tend suggest something say perfectly nice experience charming hotel reception beautifully presented manager went way make stay pleasant possible took care number special requests based nature visit yes lift small works gets right floor theres need get upset unless room room modern lot spacious central hotels paris plasma tv excellent bed comfortable jacuzzi bath huge hit yes mirror bedroom bathroom personally problem wife one couples surrounding area also fantastic superb restuarants bars sights visit hotel 5 minutes away arc de triomphe im saying negative reviewers wrong didnt experience stayed number hotels paris far better trying decide whether stay would tough call based reviews completed date im happy recommend
